title: FDI example using U.S. auto co and Russian plant

content.question: Which of the following is an example of foreign direct investment?

choices.label: A United States automobile manufacturer building a steel plant in Russia
A United States citizen purchasing corporate bonds issued by a French manufacturing firm
A Mexican citizen purchasing United States Treasury bills
The Federal Reserve purchasing Japanese yen
Immigrant workers in the United States sending money to their native country

content.answer: A United States automobile manufacturer building a steel plant in Russia

unit.text: 6: Open Economy - International Trade and Finance

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Identify an economic concept, principle, or model illustrated by an example.
